name: Back In Time (zlsinger)
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Cause as much destruction as you can in 2 minutes! The more stuff you knock around the more points you get. You can can also repair things by reversing time. Don't get too careless and knock all the props off the level.

This game supports keyboard and mouse, and Xbox controllers.

Move - WASD / Left Joystick
Jump - Space / A
Ragdoll - Q / Left Shoulder buttons
Reverse Time - E / Right Shoulder buttons
